page.title: 03DRUMBLADE SCHOOL
page.content: DRUMBLADE PRIMARY SCHOOL IS ONE OF THE FOUR MAIN FEATURES OF DRUMBLADE. ALTHOUGH IT HAS ONLY 32 PUPILS IT IS QUITE A LARGE SCHOOL.IT IS BUILT MAINLY OF GRANITE BLOCKS AND HAS 2 CLASSROOMS (PRIMARY 1-3,AND PRIMARY 4-7)A LIBRARY,A HALL WITH A STAGE AND A STAFF-ROOM. THE SCHOOL IS NOW A PRIMARY SCHOOL BUT QUITE A WHILE BACK IT WAS A JUNIOR SECONDARY WITH OVER A 100 PUPILS. THE SCHOOL HAS A FEW DIFFERENT USES. AMONGST THESE THERE ARE A BADMINTON CLUB, A BOWLING CLUB, A SCOUTS TROOP, A W.R.I. AND A PLAY-GROUP.
